mapper.insert: insert into TB_COMMENTS ( COMMENT_NUM, BOARD_NUM, ID, CONTENTS, REGDATE, MBTI, PROF_IMG ) values ( SEQ_TB_COMMENTS_COMMENT_NUM.NEXTVAL, #{BOARD_NUM}, #{ID}, #{CONTENTS}, SYSDATE, #{MBTI}, #{PROF_IMG} );
mapper.select: select COMMENT_NUM, BOARD_NUM, CONTENTS, REGDATE, ID, MBTI, PROF_IMG from TB_COMMENTS where BOARD_NUM = #{BOARD_NUM} order by COMMENT_NUM desc;
